df-poset
blocks.content: Define the class of partially ordered sets (posets). A poset is a set equipped with a partial order, that is, a binary relation which is reflexive, antisymmetric, and transitive. Unlike a total order, in a partial order there may be pairs of elements where neither precedes the other. Definition of poset in [Crawley] p. 1. Note that Crawley-Dilworth require that a poset base set be nonempty, but we follow the convention of most authors who don't make this a requirement. In our formalism of extensible structures, the base set of a poset ` f ` is denoted by ` ( Base `` f ) ` and its partial order by ` ( le `` f ) ` (for "less than or equal to"). The quantifiers ` E. b E. r ` provide a notational shorthand to allow us to refer to the base and ordering relation as ` b ` and ` r ` in the definition rather than having to repeat ` ( Base `` f ) ` and ` ( le `` f ) ` throughout. These quantifiers can be eliminated with ~ ceqsex2v and related theorems. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-poset(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cpo, cab(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w3a(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(cple, cv(s0))), wral(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cv(s1), wral(s5, cv(s1), w3a(wbr(cv(s3), cv(s2), cv(s3)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s3), cv(s2), cv(s4)), wbr(cv(s4), cv(s2), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s4))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s3), cv(s2), cv(s4)), wbr(cv(s4), cv(s2), cv(s5))), wbr(cv(s3), cv(s2), cv(s5))))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
}

axiom df-poset(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ⊢ Poset = { s0 | ∃(s1, ∃(s2,(s1 =(Base ` s0)∧ s2 =(le ` s0)∧ ∀(s3 ∈ s1, ∀(s4 ∈ s1, ∀(s5 ∈ s1,(s3[s2]s3 ∧((s3[s2]s4 ∧ s4[s2]s3)→ s3 = s4)∧((s3[s2]s4 ∧ s4[s2]s5)→ s3[s2]s5))))))))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s5)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s5)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s5)
  ⊣ d(s4, s5)
}

blocks.name: ispos2
blocks.content: A poset is an antisymmetric proset. _EDITORIAL_: could become the definition of poset. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ispos2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cpo), wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))

blocks.name: posprs
blocks.content: A poset is a proset. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm posprs(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c0, cproset))
} = {
  simplbi(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c0, cproset), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cple, c0), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  ispos2(hs0, hs1, c0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cple, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cple, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm posprs(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Poset → c0 ∈ Proset)
} = {
  simplbi(c0 ∈ Poset, c0 ∈ Proset, ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c0),((hs0[(le ` c0)]hs1 ∧ hs1[(le ` c0)]hs0)→ hs0 = hs1))))
  ispos2(hs0, hs1, c0, (Base ` c0), (le ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((le ` c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((le ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((le ` c0))
}

blocks.name: isposi
blocks.content: Properties that determine a poset (implicit structure version). (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm isposi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wcel(c0, cpo)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, w3a(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))))
  rgen3(s0, s1, s2, c1, c1, c1, w3a(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2)))))
  3jca(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)))
  3adant3(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  ispos(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: isposix
blocks.content: Properties that determine a poset (explicit structure version). Note that the numeric indices of the structure components are not mentioned explicitly in either the theorem or its proof. (Contributed by NM, 9-Nov-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm isposix(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wcel(c0, cpo)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c2)))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  isposi(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
  eqeltri(c0, universe, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c2)))
  prex(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c2))
  ax-mp(wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c1, universe))
  2strbas(c1, universe, c0, cple, c2, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  ax-mp(wceq(c2, cfv(cple, c0)), wcel(c2, universe))
  2strop(c2, universe, cple, c0, c1, cdc(nat1, nat0))
  df-ple()
  1lt10()
  10nn()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isposix(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ c0 ∈ Poset
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c0 = { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(le ` ndx), c2 > }
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c1 → s0[c2]s0)
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→((s0[c2]s1 ∧ s1[c2]s0)→ s0 = s1))
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c1)→((s0[c2]s1 ∧ s1[c2]s2)→ s0[c2]s2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  isposi(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
  eqeltri(c0, universe, { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(le ` ndx), c2 > })
  prex(<(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(le ` ndx), c2 >)
  ax-mp(c1 =(Base ` c0), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  2strbas(c1, universe, c0, cple, c2, cdc(1, 0))
  ax-mp(c2 =(le ` c0), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  2strop(c2, universe, cple, c0, c1, cdc(1, 0))
  df-ple()
  1lt10()
  10nn()
}

blocks.name: df-plt
blocks.content: Define less-than ordering for posets and related structures. Unlike ~ df-base and ~ df-ple , this is a derived component extractor and not an extensible structure component extractor that defines the poset. (Contributed by NM, 12-Oct-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: pltfval
blocks.content: Value of the less-than relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pltfval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cdif(c3, cid)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplt, c0))
} = {
  syl5eq(c2, cdif(c3, cid), cfv(cplt, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cplt, c0), cdif(c3, cid)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cplt, cdif(c3, cid), cdif(cfv(cple, cv(hs0)), cid))
  difeq1d(cfv(cple, cv(hs0)), cid, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cple, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cple, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cple)
  df-plt(hs0)
  difexi(c3, cid)
  fvexi(c3, cple, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c3, cid))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pltfval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 =(c3 \ =))
  ⊣ c3 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(lt ` c0)
} = {
  syl5eq(c2, (c3 \ =), (lt ` c0), c0 ∈ c1)
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, (lt ` c0)=(c3 \ =), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cplt, (c3 \ =), ((le ` hs0)\ =))
  difeq1d((le ` hs0), cid, c3, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((le ` hs0), c3, (le ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cple)
  df-plt(hs0)
  difexi(c3, cid)
  fvexi(c3, cple, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((c3 \ =))
}

blocks.name: pltval
blocks.content: Less-than relation. ( ~ df-pss analog.) (Contributed by NM, 12-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm pltval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wb(wbr(c2, c6, c4), wa(wbr(c2, c7, c4), wne(c2, c4))))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplt, c0))
} = {
  3impb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wb(wbr(c2, c6, c4), wa(wbr(c2, c7, c4), wne(c2, c4))))
  sylan9bb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(c2, c6, c4), wa(wbr(c2, c7, c4), wne(c2, c4)), wbr(c2, cdif(c7, cid), c4))
  breqd(c2, c6, c4, cdif(c7, cid), wcel(c0, c1))
  pltfval(c0, c1, c6, c7)
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(c2, cdif(c7, cid), c4), wa(wbr(c2, c7, c4), wne(c2, c4)), wa(wbr(c2, c7, c4), wn(wbr(c2, cid, c4))))
  brdif(c2, c7, cid, c4)
  anbi2d(wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(c2, c7, c4), wn(wbr(c2, cid, c4)), wne(c2, c4))
  adantl(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wb(wn(wbr(c2, cid, c4)), wne(c2, c4)))
  necon3bbid(c2, c4, wcel(c4, c5), wbr(c2, cid, c4))
  ideqg(c4, c5, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pltval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c5)→(c2[c6]c4 ↔(c2[c7]c4 ∧ c2 ≠ c4)))
  ⊣ c7 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(lt ` c0)
} = {
  3impb(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c4 ∈ c5, (c2[c6]c4 ↔(c2[c7]c4 ∧ c2 ≠ c4)))
  sylan9bb(c0 ∈ c1, (c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c5), c2[c6]c4, (c2[c7]c4 ∧ c2 ≠ c4), c2[(c7 \ =)]c4)
  breqd(c2, c6, c4, (c7 \ =), c0 ∈ c1)
  pltfval(c0, c1, c6, c7)
  syl5bb((c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c5), c2[(c7 \ =)]c4, (c2[c7]c4 ∧ c2 ≠ c4), (c2[c7]c4 ∧ ¬ c2[=]c4))
  brdif(c2, c7, cid, c4)
  anbi2d((c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c5), c2[c7]c4, ¬ c2[=]c4, c2 ≠ c4)
  adantl(c2 ∈ c3, c4 ∈ c5, (¬ c2[=]c4 ↔ c2 ≠ c4))
  necon3bbid(c2, c4, c4 ∈ c5, c2[=]c4)
  ideqg(c4, c5, c2)
}

blocks.name: pltle
blocks.content: "Less than" implies "less than or equal to". ( ~ pssss analog.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2011.)

blocks.name: pltne
blocks.content: The "less than" relation is not reflexive. ( ~ df-pss analog.) (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2011.)

blocks.name: pltirr
blocks.content: The "less than" relation is not reflexive. ( ~ pssirr analog.) (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2012.)

blocks.name: pleval2i
blocks.content: One direction of ~ pleval2 . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pleval2i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wi(wbr(c0, c3, c2), wo(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wceq(c0, c2))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplt, c5))
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c3, c2), wo(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wceq(c0, c2)))
  orrd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c3, c2)), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wceq(c0, c2))
  necon1bd(c0, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c3, c2)), wbr(c0, c4, c2))
  expr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c3, c2), wne(c0, c2), wbr(c0, c4, c2))
  biimpar(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wbr(c0, c3, c2), wne(c0, c2)), wbr(c0, c4, c2))
  mpancom(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wa(wbr(c0, c3, c2), wne(c0, c2))), wcel(c5, cdm(cbs)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c5, cdm(cbs)))
  eleq2s(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c5), wcel(c5, cdm(cbs)))
  elfvdm(c0, cbs, c5)
  3expb(wcel(c5, cdm(cbs)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wb(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wa(wbr(c0, c3, c2), wne(c0, c2))))
  pltval(c5, cdm(cbs), c0, c1, c2, c1, c4, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pleval2i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)→(c0[c3]c2 →(c0[c4]c2 ∨ c0 = c2)))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c3 =(le ` c5)
  ⊣ c4 =(lt ` c5)
} = {
  ex((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), c0[c3]c2, (c0[c4]c2 ∨ c0 = c2))
  orrd(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)∧ c0[c3]c2), c0[c4]c2, c0 = c2)
  necon1bd(c0, c2, ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)∧ c0[c3]c2), c0[c4]c2)
  expr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), c0[c3]c2, c0 ≠ c2, c0[c4]c2)
  biimpar((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), (c0[c3]c2 ∧ c0 ≠ c2), c0[c4]c2)
  mpancom((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), (c0[c4]c2 ↔(c0[c3]c2 ∧ c0 ≠ c2)), c5 ∈ dom(Base))
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c1, c5 ∈ dom(Base))
  eleq2s(c0, c1, (Base ` c5), c5 ∈ dom(Base))
  elfvdm(c0, cbs, c5)
  3expb(c5 ∈ dom(Base), c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c1, (c0[c4]c2 ↔(c0[c3]c2 ∧ c0 ≠ c2)))
  pltval(c5, dom(Base), c0, c1, c2, c1, c4, c3)
}

blocks.name: pleval2
blocks.content: "Less than or equal to" in terms of "less than". ( ~ sspss analog.) (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pleval2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wb(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wo(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wceq(c1, c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplt, c0))
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wo(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wceq(c1, c3)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wi(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wo(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wceq(c1, c3))))
  pleval2i(c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c0)
  jaod(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wceq(c1, c3), wbr(c1, c4, c3))
  pltle(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c3, c2, c5, c4)
  syl5ibcom(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c3), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wbr(c1, c4, c1))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wbr(c1, c4, c1))
  posref(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  breq2(c1, c3, c1, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pleval2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4]c3 ↔(c1[c5]c3 ∨ c1 = c3)))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(lt ` c0)
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[c4]c3, (c1[c5]c3 ∨ c1 = c3))
  3adant1(c0 ∈ Poset, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c1[c4]c3 →(c1[c5]c3 ∨ c1 = c3)))
  pleval2i(c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c0)
  jaod((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[c5]c3, c1 = c3, c1[c4]c3)
  pltle(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c3, c2, c5, c4)
  syl5ibcom((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1 = c3, c1[c4]c3, c1[c4]c1)
  3adant3(c0 ∈ Poset, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c1[c4]c1)
  posref(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  breq2(c1, c3, c1, c4)
}

blocks.name: pltnle
blocks.content: "Less than" implies not converse "less than or equal to". (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm pltnle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c4, c3)), wn(wbr(c3, c5, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplt, c0))
} = {
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wn(wbr(c3, c5, c1)))
  sylbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wn(wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wne(c1, c3)))
  pltval(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c3, c2, c4, c5)
  expimpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wne(c1, c3), wn(wbr(c3, c5, c1)))
  necon3ad(c1, c3, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c5, c3)), wbr(c3, c5, c1))
  expdimp(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1), wceq(c1, c3))
  biimpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wceq(c1, c3))
  posasymb(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pltnle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧ c1[c4]c3)→ ¬ c3[c5]c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(lt ` c0)
} = {
  imp((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[c4]c3, ¬ c3[c5]c1)
  sylbid((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[c4]c3, ¬ c3[c5]c1, (c1[c5]c3 ∧ c1 ≠ c3))
  pltval(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c3, c2, c4, c5)
  expimpd((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[c5]c3, c1 ≠ c3, ¬ c3[c5]c1)
  necon3ad(c1, c3, ((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧ c1[c5]c3), c3[c5]c1)
  expdimp((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[c5]c3, c3[c5]c1, c1 = c3)
  biimpd((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (c1[c5]c3 ∧ c3[c5]c1), c1 = c3)
  posasymb(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
}

blocks.name: pltval3

blocks.origin:
thm pltval3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wb(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wn(wbr(c3, c5, c1)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplt, c0))
} = {
  bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wn(wbr(c3, c5, c1))), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wne(c1, c3)))
  pltval(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c3, c2, c4, c5)
  pm5.32da(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wne(c1, c3), wn(wbr(c3, c5, c1)))
  necon3abid(c1, c3, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c5, c3)), wbr(c3, c5, c1))
  impbid(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c5, c3)), wceq(c1, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wi(wceq(c1, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1)))
  syl5ibcom(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1), wbr(c1, c5, c1))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wbr(c1, c5, c1))
  posref(c0, c1, c2, c5)
  breq1(c1, c3, c5, c1)
  expdimp(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1), wceq(c1, c3))
  biimpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wceq(c1, c3))
  posasymb(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pltval3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4]c3 ↔(c1[c5]c3 ∧ ¬ c3[c5]c1)))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(lt ` c0)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[c4]c3, (c1[c5]c3 ∧ ¬ c3[c5]c1), (c1[c5]c3 ∧ c1 ≠ c3))
  pltval(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c3, c2, c4, c5)
  pm5.32da((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[c5]c3, c1 ≠ c3, ¬ c3[c5]c1)
  necon3abid(c1, c3, ((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧ c1[c5]c3), c3[c5]c1)
  impbid(((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)∧ c1[c5]c3), c1 = c3, c3[c5]c1)
  adantr((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[c5]c3, (c1 = c3 → c3[c5]c1))
  syl5ibcom((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1 = c3, c3[c5]c1, c1[c5]c1)
  3adant3(c0 ∈ Poset, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c1[c5]c1)
  posref(c0, c1, c2, c5)
  breq1(c1, c3, c5, c1)
  expdimp((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[c5]c3, c3[c5]c1, c1 = c3)
  biimpd((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (c1[c5]c3 ∧ c3[c5]c1), c1 = c3)
  posasymb(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
}

blocks.name: pltnlt
blocks.content: The less-than relation implies the negation of its inverse. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2011.)

blocks.name: pltn2lp
blocks.content: The less-than relation has no 2-cycle loops. ( ~ pssn2lp analog.) (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm pltn2lp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wn(wa(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wbr(c3, c4, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplt, c0))
} = {
  sylib(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wn(wa(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wbr(c3, c4, c1))), wi(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wn(wbr(c3, c4, c1))))
  nsyld(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wbr(c3, c4, c1), wbr(c3, cfv(cple, c0), c1))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wn(wbr(c3, cfv(cple, c0), c1)))
  pltnle(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cple, c0))
  3com23(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wi(wbr(c3, c4, c1), wbr(c3, cfv(cple, c0), c1)))
  pltle(c0, cpo, c3, c2, c1, c2, c4, cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
  imnan(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wbr(c3, c4, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pltn2lp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→ ¬(c1[c4]c3 ∧ c3[c4]c1))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(lt ` c0)
} = {
  sylib((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), ¬(c1[c4]c3 ∧ c3[c4]c1), (c1[c4]c3 → ¬ c3[c4]c1))
  nsyld((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[c4]c3, c3[c4]c1, c3[(le ` c0)]c1)
  ex((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[c4]c3, ¬ c3[(le ` c0)]c1)
  pltnle(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (le ` c0))
  3com23(c0 ∈ Poset, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c3[c4]c1 → c3[(le ` c0)]c1))
  pltle(c0, cpo, c3, c2, c1, c2, c4, (le ` c0))
  eqid((le ` c0))
  imnan(c1[c4]c3, c3[c4]c1)
}

blocks.name: plttr
blocks.content: The less-than relation is transitive. ( ~ psstr analog.) (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm plttr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wi(wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c4)), wbr(c1, c5, c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplt, c0))
} = {
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c4)), wbr(c1, c5, c4), wa(wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c4), wne(c1, c4)))
  jcad(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c4)), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c4), wne(c1, c4))
  syl2and(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c4), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c4), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3), wbr(c3, cfv(cple, c0), c4))
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wi(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3)))
  pltle(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c3, c2, c5, cfv(cple, c0))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wi(wbr(c3, c5, c4), wbr(c3, cfv(cple, c0), c4)))
  pltle(c0, cpo, c3, c2, c4, c2, c5, cfv(cple, c0))
  postr(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cple, c0))
  necon2ad(c1, c4, wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c4)))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(c1, c4), wn(wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c4))), wn(wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1))))
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wn(wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1))))
  pltn2lp(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  notbid(wceq(c1, c4), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c4)))
  anbi2d(wceq(c1, c4), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1), wbr(c3, c5, c4))
  breq2(c1, c4, c3, c5)
  3adant3r2(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wb(wbr(c1, c5, c4), wa(wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c4), wne(c1, c4))))
  pltval(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c4, c2, c5, cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm plttr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Poset ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))→((c1[c5]c3 ∧ c3[c5]c4)→ c1[c5]c4))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(lt ` c0)
} = {
  sylibrd((c0 ∈ Poset ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), (c1[c5]c3 ∧ c3[c5]c4), c1[c5]c4, (c1[(le ` c0)]c4 ∧ c1 ≠ c4))
  jcad((c0 ∈ Poset ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), (c1[c5]c3 ∧ c3[c5]c4), c1[(le ` c0)]c4, c1 ≠ c4)

  3adant3r3(c0 ∈ Poset, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c1[c5]c3 → c1[(le ` c0)]c3))
  pltle(c0, cpo, c1, c2, c3, c2, c5, (le ` c0))
  3adant3r1(c0 ∈ Poset, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c3[c5]c4 → c3[(le ` c0)]c4))

blocks.name: pltletr
blocks.content: Transitive law for chained "less than" and "less than or equal to". ( ~ psssstr analog.) (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm pltletr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wi(wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c6, c4)), wbr(c1, c5, c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplt, c0))
} = {
  expimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c6, c4), wbr(c1, c5, c4))
  sylbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(c1, c5, c3)), wbr(c3, c6, c4), wbr(c1, c5, c4), wo(wbr(c3, c5, c4), wceq(c3, c4)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wb(wbr(c3, c6, c4), wo(wbr(c3, c5, c4), wceq(c3, c4))))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wb(wbr(c3, c6, c4), wo(wbr(c3, c5, c4), wceq(c3, c4))))
  pleval2(c0, c3, c2, c4, c6, c5)
  jaod(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(c1, c5, c3)), wbr(c3, c5, c4), wceq(c3, c4), wbr(c1, c5, c4))
  expdimp(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c4), wbr(c1, c5, c4))
  plttr(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(c1, c5, c3), wi(wceq(c3, c4), wbr(c1, c5, c4)))
  biimpcd(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wceq(c3, c4), wbr(c1, c5, c4))
  breq2(c3, c4, c1, c5)
}

  3adant3r1(c0 ∈ Poset, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c3[c6]c4 ↔(c3[c5]c4 ∨ c3 = c4)))
  pleval2(c0, c3, c2, c4, c6, c5)

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)

axiom df-glb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ⊢ glb =(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((s1 ∈ P((Base ` s0))↦ iota(s2 ∈(Base ` s0),(∀(s3 ∈ s1, s2[(le ` s0)]s3)∧ ∀(s4 ∈(Base ` s0),(∀(s3 ∈ s1, s4[(le ` s0)]s3)→ s4[(le ` s0)]s2)))))|` { s1 | ∃!(s2 ∈(Base ` s0),(∀(s3 ∈ s1, s2[(le ` s0)]s3)∧ ∀(s4 ∈(Base ` s0),(∀(s3 ∈ s1, s4[(le ` s0)]s3)→ s4[(le ` s0)]s2))))}))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-join
blocks.content: Define poset join. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2015.)

axiom df-join(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cjn, cmpt(s0, universe, coprab(s1, s2, s3, wbr(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cfv(club, cv(s0)), cv(s3)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-join(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ join =(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { < < s1, s2 >, s3 > | { s1, s2 }[(lub ` s0)]s3 })
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
}

axiom df-meet(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cmee, cmpt(s0, universe, coprab(s1, s2, s3, wbr(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cfv(cglb, cv(s0)), cv(s3)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

blocks.pretty:
axiom df-meet(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ meet =(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { < < s1, s2 >, s3 > | { s1, s2 }[(glb ` s0)]s3 })
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
}

thm lubdm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wreu(s1, c1, w1))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(club, c2))
  -| wb(w1, wa(wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1))), wral(s3, c1, wi(wral(s2, cv(s0), wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s3))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))

  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  syl6eq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wreu(s1, c1, w1)), cdm(cres(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1)), cab(s0, wreu(s1, c1, w1)))), w0)
  dmeqd(c0, cres(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1)), cab(s0, wreu(s1, c1, w1))), w0)
  lubfval(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0, w1)
  3eqtr4i(cdm(cres(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1)), cab(s0, wreu(s1, c1, w1)))), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wreu(s1, c1, w1)), cin(cab(s0, wreu(s1, c1, w1)), cdm(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1)))), cin(cab(s0, wreu(s1, c1, w1)), cpw(c1)))
  ineq2i(cab(s0, wreu(s1, c1, w1)), cdm(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1))), cpw(c1))
  dmmpti(s0, cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1)), cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1))
  riotaex(s1, c1, w1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1)))
  dmres(cmpt(s0, cpw(c1), crio(s1, c1, w1)), cab(s0, wreu(s1, c1, w1)))

  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)

thm lubdm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → dom(c0)= { s0 ∈ P(c1)| ∃!(s1 ∈ c1, w1)})
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(le ` c2)
  ⊣ c0 =(lub ` c2)
  ⊣ (w1 ↔(∀(s2 ∈ s0, s2[c3]s1)∧ ∀(s3 ∈ c1,(∀(s2 ∈ s0, s2[c3]s3)→ s1[c3]s3))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
} = {
  syl6eq(dom(c0), { s0 ∈ P(c1)| ∃!(s1 ∈ c1, w1)}, dom(((s0 ∈ P(c1)↦ iota(s1 ∈ c1, w1))|` { s0 | ∃!(s1 ∈ c1, w1)})), w0)
  dmeqd(c0, ((s0 ∈ P(c1)↦ iota(s1 ∈ c1, w1))|` { s0 | ∃!(s1 ∈ c1, w1)}), w0)
  lubfval(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0, w1)
  3eqtr4i(dom(((s0 ∈ P(c1)↦ iota(s1 ∈ c1, w1))|` { s0 | ∃!(s1 ∈ c1, w1)})), { s0 ∈ P(c1)| ∃!(s1 ∈ c1, w1)}, ({ s0 | ∃!(s1 ∈ c1, w1)} ⋂ dom((s0 ∈ P(c1)↦ iota(s1 ∈ c1, w1)))), ({ s0 | ∃!(s1 ∈ c1, w1)} ⋂ P(c1)))
  ineq2i({ s0 | ∃!(s1 ∈ c1, w1)}, dom((s0 ∈ P(c1)↦ iota(s1 ∈ c1, w1))), P(c1))
  dmmpti(s0, (s0 ∈ P(c1)↦ iota(s1 ∈ c1, w1)), P(c1), iota(s1 ∈ c1, w1))
  riotaex(s1, c1, w1)
  eqid((s0 ∈ P(c1)↦ iota(s1 ∈ c1, w1)))
  dmres((s0 ∈ P(c1)↦ iota(s1 ∈ c1, w1)), { s0 | ∃!(s1 ∈ c1, w1)})
  dfrab2(s0, P(c1), ∃!(s1 ∈ c1, w1))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
}

  diff.hs0.s(s1)

blocks.name: lubelss
blocks.content: A member of the domain of the least upper bound function is a subset of the base set. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm lubelss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(club, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))
} = {
  simpld(w0, wss(c0, c1), wreu(hs1, c1, wa(wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wi(wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2)))))))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wss(c0, c1), wreu(hs1, c1, wa(wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wi(wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2))))))), wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))
  lubeldm(hs1, hs0, hs2, c0, c4, c1, c2, c3, c5, w0, wa(wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wi(wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2))))))
  biid(wa(wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wi(wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2))))))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
}

thm lubelss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(le ` c2)
  ⊣ c4 =(lub ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)

  lubeldm(hs1, hs0, hs2, c0, c4, c1, c2, c3, c5, w0, (∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[c3]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[c3]hs2)→ hs1[c3]hs2))))
  biid((∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[c3]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0[c3]hs2)→ hs1[c3]hs2))))

blocks.name: lubeu
blocks.content: Unique existence proper of a member of the domain of the least upper bound function of a poset. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm lubeu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wreu(s0, c0, w1))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cple, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(club, c1))
  -| wb(w1, wa(wral(s1, c4, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s2, c0, wi(wral(s1, c4, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s2))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cdm(c3)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
} = {
  simprd(w0, wreu(s0, c0, w1), wss(c4, c0))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wss(c4, c0), wreu(s0, c0, w1)), wcel(c4, cdm(c3)))
  lubeldm(s0, s1, s2, c4, c3, c0, c1, c2, c5, w0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lubeu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃!(s0 ∈ c0, w1))
  ⊣ c0 =(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(le ` c1)
  ⊣ c3 =(lub ` c1)
  ⊣ (w1 ↔(∀(s1 ∈ c4, s1[c2]s0)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0,(∀(s1 ∈ c4, s1[c2]s2)→ s0[c2]s2))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ dom(c3))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
} = {
  simprd(w0, ∃!(s0 ∈ c0, w1), c4 ⊆ c0)
  mpbid(w0, (c4 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∃!(s0 ∈ c0, w1)), c4 ∈ dom(c3))
  lubeldm(s0, s1, s2, c4, c3, c0, c1, c2, c5, w0, w1)
}

  eqid(cfv(cple, c3))
  biid(wa(wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c2, wi(wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs2))))))
  riotacl(hs1, c2, wa(wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c2, wi(wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs2))))))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)

  diff.hs0.s(hs2)

  diff.hs1.c(c2)

thm lubcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c0 =(lub ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ dom(c0))
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0 ` c1), c2, iota(hs1 ∈ c2,(∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs2)→ hs1[(le ` c3)]hs2)))), w0)
  lubval(hs1, hs0, hs2, c0, c1, c2, c3, (le ` c3), c4, w0, (∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs2)→ hs1[(le ` c3)]hs2))))
  lubelss(c1, c2, c3, (le ` c3), c0, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, iota(hs1 ∈ c2,(∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs2)→ hs1[(le ` c3)]hs2))))∈ c2, ∃!(hs1 ∈ c2,(∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs2)→ hs1[(le ` c3)]hs2)))))
  lubeu(hs1, hs0, hs2, c2, c3, (le ` c3), c0, c1, c4, w0, (∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs2)→ hs1[(le ` c3)]hs2))))
  eqid((le ` c3))
  biid((∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs2)→ hs1[(le ` c3)]hs2))))
  riotacl(hs1, c2, (∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs2)→ hs1[(le ` c3)]hs2))))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)

thm lubprop(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(c2, c0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cple, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(club, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(c2, c0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1)))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  mpbird(w0, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(c2, c0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1))))), wceq(crio(hs0, c3, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)))))), cfv(c2, c0)))
  eqcomd(crio(hs0, c3, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)))))), cfv(c2, c0), w0)
  lubval(hs0, s0, s1, c2, c0, c3, c4, c1, c5, w0, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1))))))
  lubelss(c0, c3, c4, c1, c2, c5, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(c2, c0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1))))), wceq(crio(hs0, c3, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)))))), cfv(c2, c0))), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c3), wreu(hs0, c3, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)))))))
  lubcl(c2, c0, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  lubeu(hs0, s0, s1, c3, c4, c1, c2, c0, c5, w0, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1))))))
  biid(wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1))))))
  riota2(hs0, cfv(c2, c0), c3, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1))))), wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(c2, c0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(c2, c0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1)))))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(c2, c0)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0), cv(s0), c1)
  ralbidv(s1, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1))), wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1))

  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)

  diff.hs0.w(wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(c2, c0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cv(s1))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(c2, c0))

thm luble(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cple, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(club, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cdm(c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
} = {
  rspcdva(hs0, c0, c3, w0, wbr(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(c2, c3)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3))
  simpld(w0, wral(hs0, c3, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(c2, c3))), wral(hs1, c4, wi(wral(hs0, c3, wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c2, c3), c1, cv(hs1)))))
  lubprop(hs0, hs1, c3, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
}

thm luble(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[c1](c2 ` c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)

  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)

} = {

  breq1(hs0, c0, c1, (c2 ` c3))
  simpld(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c3, hs0[c1](c2 ` c3)), ∀(hs1 ∈ c4,(∀(hs0 ∈ c3, hs0[c1]hs1)→(c2 ` c3)[c1]hs1)))

  diff.hs0.c(c5)

  diff.hs1.c(c4)

blocks.name: lublecl
blocks.content: The set of all elements less than a given element has an LUB. (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm lublecl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), cdm(c3)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cple, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(club, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cpo))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), cdm(c3)), wss(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), c0), wreu(hs1, c0, wa(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c0, wi(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)))))))
  a1i(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), c0))
  ssrab2(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2))
  syl2anc(w0, wreu(hs1, c0, wa(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c0, wi(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)))))), wcel(c2, c0), wral(hs1, c0, wb(wa(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c0, wi(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c0, w0, wb(wa(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c0, wi(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  lublecllem(hs1, hs0, s0, hs2, c0, c1, c2, c4, c3, w0)
  reu6i(hs1, c2, c0, wa(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c0, wi(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))))
  lubeldm(hs1, hs0, hs2, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), c3, c0, c4, c1, cpo, w0, wa(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c0, wi(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))))
  biid(wa(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c0, wi(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2))))))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

thm lublecl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 } ∈ dom(c3))
  ⊣ c0 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(le ` c4)
  ⊣ c3 =(lub ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ Poset)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 } ∈ dom(c3), { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 } ⊆ c0, ∃!(hs1 ∈ c0,(∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs2)→ hs1[c1]hs2)))))
  a1i(w0, { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 } ⊆ c0)
  ssrab2(s0, c0, s0[c1]c2)
  syl2anc(w0, ∃!(hs1 ∈ c0,(∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs2)→ hs1[c1]hs2)))), c2 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,((∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs2)→ hs1[c1]hs2)))↔ hs1 = c2)))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c0, w0, ((∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs2)→ hs1[c1]hs2)))↔ hs1 = c2))
  lublecllem(hs1, hs0, s0, hs2, c0, c1, c2, c4, c3, w0)
  reu6i(hs1, c2, c0, (∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs2)→ hs1[c1]hs2))))
  lubeldm(hs1, hs0, hs2, { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, c3, c0, c4, c1, cpo, w0, (∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs2)→ hs1[c1]hs2))))
  biid((∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 }, hs0[c1]hs2)→ hs1[c1]hs2))))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 })
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 })
  diff.hs2.c({ s0 ∈ c0 | s0[c1]c2 })
}

blocks.name: lubid
blocks.content: The LUB of elements less than or equal to a fixed value equals that value. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-2011.) (Revised by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm lubid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3))), c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cple, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(club, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cpo))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3))), c3, crio(hs1, c1, wa(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wi(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2)))))), w0)
  lubval(hs1, hs0, hs2, c0, crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3)), c1, c4, c2, cpo, w0, wa(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wi(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))))))
  biid(wa(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wi(wral(hs0, crab(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c2, c3)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))))))

  lublecllem(hs1, hs0, s0, hs2, c1, c2, c3, c4, c0, w0)

thm lubid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` { s0 ∈ c1 | s0[c2]c3 })= c3)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c2 =(le ` c4)
  ⊣ c0 =(lub ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ Poset)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0 ` { s0 ∈ c1 | s0[c2]c3 }), c3, iota(hs1 ∈ c1,(∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, hs0[c2]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, hs0[c2]hs2)→ hs1[c2]hs2)))), w0)
  lubval(hs1, hs0, hs2, c0, { s0 ∈ c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, c1, c4, c2, cpo, w0, (∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, hs0[c2]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, hs0[c2]hs2)→ hs1[c2]hs2))))
  biid((∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, hs0[c2]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, hs0[c2]hs2)→ hs1[c2]hs2))))
  a1i(w0, { s0 ∈ c1 | s0[c2]c3 } ⊆ c1)
  ssrab2(s0, c1, s0[c2]c3)
  riota5(hs1, c1, c3, w0, (∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, hs0[c2]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(∀(hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | s0[c2]c3 }, hs0[c2]hs2)→ hs1[c2]hs2))))
  lublecllem(hs1, hs0, s0, hs2, c1, c2, c3, c4, c0, w0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 ∈ c1 | s0[c2]c3 })
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ∈ c1 | s0[c2]c3 })
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c({ s0 ∈ c1 | s0[c2]c3 })
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: glbelss
blocks.content: A member of the domain of the greatest lower bound function is a subset of the base set. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm glbelss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cglb, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))
} = {
  simpld(w0, wss(c0, c1), wreu(hs0, c1, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wi(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs2), c3, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), c3, cv(hs0)))))))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wss(c0, c1), wreu(hs0, c1, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wi(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs2), c3, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), c3, cv(hs0))))))), wcel(c0, cdm(c4)))
  glbeldm(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c4, c1, c2, c3, c5, w0, wa(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wi(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs2), c3, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), c3, cv(hs0))))))
  biid(wa(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c1, wi(wral(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs2), c3, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), c3, cv(hs0))))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm glbelss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(le ` c2)
  ⊣ c4 =(glb ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ dom(c4))
} = {
  simpld(w0, c0 ⊆ c1, ∃!(hs0 ∈ c1,(∀(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0[c3]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(∀(hs1 ∈ c0, hs2[c3]hs1)→ hs2[c3]hs0)))))
  mpbid(w0, (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∃!(hs0 ∈ c1,(∀(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0[c3]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(∀(hs1 ∈ c0, hs2[c3]hs1)→ hs2[c3]hs0))))), c0 ∈ dom(c4))
  glbeldm(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c4, c1, c2, c3, c5, w0, (∀(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0[c3]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(∀(hs1 ∈ c0, hs2[c3]hs1)→ hs2[c3]hs0))))
  biid((∀(hs1 ∈ c0, hs0[c3]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(∀(hs1 ∈ c0, hs2[c3]hs1)→ hs2[c3]hs0))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: glbeu
blocks.content: Unique existence proper of a member of the domain of the greatest lower bound function of a poset. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm glbeu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wreu(s0, c0, w1))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cple, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cglb, c1))
  -| wb(w1, wa(wral(s1, c4, wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))), wral(s2, c0, wi(wral(s1, c4, wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cdm(c3)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
} = {
  simprd(w0, wreu(s0, c0, w1), wss(c4, c0))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wss(c4, c0), wreu(s0, c0, w1)), wcel(c4, cdm(c3)))
  glbeldm(s0, s1, s2, c4, c3, c0, c1, c2, c5, w0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm glbeu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃!(s0 ∈ c0, w1))
  ⊣ c0 =(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(le ` c1)
  ⊣ c3 =(glb ` c1)
  ⊣ (w1 ↔(∀(s1 ∈ c4, s0[c2]s1)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0,(∀(s1 ∈ c4, s2[c2]s1)→ s2[c2]s0))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ dom(c3))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
} = {
  simprd(w0, ∃!(s0 ∈ c0, w1), c4 ⊆ c0)
  mpbid(w0, (c4 ⊆ c0 ∧ ∃!(s0 ∈ c0, w1)), c4 ∈ dom(c3))
  glbeldm(s0, s1, s2, c4, c3, c0, c1, c2, c5, w0, w1)
}

blocks.content: The least upper bound function value belongs to the base set. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm glbcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cglb, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
} = {
  eqeltrd(cfv(c0, c1), c2, crio(hs0, c2, wa(wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c2, wi(wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs0)))))), w0)
  glbval(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cple, c3), c4, w0, wa(wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c2, wi(wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs0))))))
  glbelss(c1, c2, c3, cfv(cple, c3), c0, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(crio(hs0, c2, wa(wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c2, wi(wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs0)))))), c2), wreu(hs0, c2, wa(wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c2, wi(wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs0)))))))
  glbeu(hs0, hs1, hs2, c2, c3, cfv(cple, c3), c0, c1, c4, w0, wa(wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c2, wi(wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs0))))))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c3))
  biid(wa(wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c2, wi(wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs0))))))
  riotacl(hs0, c2, wa(wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs1))), wral(hs2, c2, wi(wral(hs1, c1, wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs2), cfv(cple, c3), cv(hs0))))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm glbcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c0 =(glb ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ dom(c0))
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0 ` c1), c2, iota(hs0 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs2[(le ` c3)]hs1)→ hs2[(le ` c3)]hs0)))), w0)
  glbval(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, c2, c3, (le ` c3), c4, w0, (∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs2[(le ` c3)]hs1)→ hs2[(le ` c3)]hs0))))
  glbelss(c1, c2, c3, (le ` c3), c0, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, iota(hs0 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs2[(le ` c3)]hs1)→ hs2[(le ` c3)]hs0))))∈ c2, ∃!(hs0 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs2[(le ` c3)]hs1)→ hs2[(le ` c3)]hs0)))))
  glbeu(hs0, hs1, hs2, c2, c3, (le ` c3), c0, c1, c4, w0, (∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs2[(le ` c3)]hs1)→ hs2[(le ` c3)]hs0))))
  eqid((le ` c3))
  biid((∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs2[(le ` c3)]hs1)→ hs2[(le ` c3)]hs0))))
  riotacl(hs0, c2, (∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c3)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs2[(le ` c3)]hs1)→ hs2[(le ` c3)]hs0))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: glbprop
blocks.content: Properties of greatest lower bound of a poset. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm glbprop(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, c0), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c1, c0))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cple, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cglb, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, c0), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c1, c0)))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  mpbird(w0, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, c0), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c1, c0))))), wceq(crio(hs0, c3, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)))))), cfv(c1, c0)))
  eqcomd(crio(hs0, c3, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)))))), cfv(c1, c0), w0)
  glbval(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c0, c3, c4, c2, c5, w0, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0))))))
  glbelss(c0, c3, c4, c2, c1, c5, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, c0), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c1, c0))))), wceq(crio(hs0, c3, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)))))), cfv(c1, c0))), wcel(cfv(c1, c0), c3), wreu(hs0, c3, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)))))))
  glbcl(c1, c0, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  glbeu(hs0, s0, s1, c3, c4, c2, c1, c0, c5, w0, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0))))))
  biid(wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0))))))
  riota2(hs0, cfv(c1, c0), c3, wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0))))), wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, c0), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c1, c0))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)))), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, c0), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c1, c0)))))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(c1, c0), c2, cv(s0)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, c0), c2, cv(s0))
  ralbidv(s1, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, c0)), wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0))), wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c1, c0))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c1, c0)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, c0), cv(s1), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c1, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, c0), c2, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cfv(c1, c0))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(c1, c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), cfv(c1, c0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, c0)
}

blocks.name: glble
blocks.content: The greatest lower bound is the least element. (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2011.) (Revised by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm glble(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cple, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cglb, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
} = {
  rspcdva(hs0, c3, c1, w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cv(hs0)))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c3, cfv(c0, c1), c2)
  simpld(w0, wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cv(hs0))), wral(hs1, c4, wi(wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cfv(c0, c1)))))
  glbprop(hs0, hs1, c1, c0, c2, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm glble(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)[c2]c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c2 =(le ` c5)
  ⊣ c0 =(glb ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ dom(c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c1)
} = {
  rspcdva(hs0, c3, c1, w0, (c0 ` c1)[c2]c3, (c0 ` c1)[c2]hs0)
  breq2(hs0, c3, (c0 ` c1), c2)
  simpld(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` c1)[c2]hs0), ∀(hs1 ∈ c4,(∀(hs0 ∈ c1, hs1[c2]hs0)→ hs1[c2](c0 ` c1))))
  glbprop(hs0, hs1, c1, c0, c2, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ` c1)[c2]c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
}

blocks.content: Value of join function for a poset. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2011.) (Revised by NM, 9-Sep-2018.) TODO: prove ~ joinfval2 first to reduce net proof size (existence part)?
blocks.origin:
thm joinfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(club, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cjn, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(c2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))), cfv(cjn, c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cfv(cjn, c0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)))), wcel(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))), universe))
  ssexd(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), universe, wcel(c0, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), universe))
  oprabex(s0, s1, s2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wmo(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  moeq(s2, cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  eqid(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, universe), wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))))
  alrimiv(s0, wcel(c0, universe), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
  alrimiv(s1, wcel(c0, universe), wal(s2, wi(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))
  alrimiv(s2, wcel(c0, universe), wi(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2))))
  ax-mp(wb(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2)))), wfun(c3))
  lubfun(c3, c0)
  funbrfv2b(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))
  anim12d1(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))

  dmoprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  opabbii(s0, s1, wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)))
  mpbiran2(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))

  opabbii(s0, s1, ∃(hs0,({ s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs0 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 }))), { s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3))
  mpbiran2(∃(hs0,({ s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs0 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 }))), { s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3), ∃(hs0, hs0 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 })))

  opelopabg(hs0, hs1, c0, c6, c1, c7, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cdm(c3)), wcel(cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)))
  eleq1d(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3), cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cdm(c3)))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cdm(c3)))
}

thm joindef(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(< c0, c1 > ∈ dom(c2)↔ { c0, c1 } ∈ dom(c3)))
  ⊣ c3 =(lub ` c4)
  ⊣ c2 =(join ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)

} = {
  bitrd(w0, < c0, c1 > ∈ dom(c2), { c0, c1 } ∈ dom(c3), < c0, c1 > ∈ { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)})
  syl(w0, (< c0, c1 > ∈ dom(c2)↔ < c0, c1 > ∈ { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)}), c4 ∈ c5)
  eleq2d(< c0, c1 >, dom(c2), { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)}, c4 ∈ c5)
  joindm(hs0, hs1, c4, c5, c2, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, (< c0, c1 > ∈ { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)} ↔ { c0, c1 } ∈ dom(c3)), c0 ∈ c6, c1 ∈ c7)
  opelopabg(hs0, hs1, c0, c6, c1, c7, { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3), { c0, c1 } ∈ dom(c3), { c0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3))
  eleq1d({ hs0, hs1 }, dom(c3), { c0, hs1 }, hs0 = c0)
  preq1(hs0, c0, hs1)
  eleq1d({ c0, hs1 }, dom(c3), { c0, c1 }, hs1 = c1)
  preq2(hs1, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

thm joinval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c7))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))), wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)))
  eqtrd(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), co(c0, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), c2), wa(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), c2)))
  oveqd(c0, c1, c2, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c1, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), wcel(c4, c5))
  joinfval2(hs0, hs1, hs2, c4, c5, c1, c3)
  mp2and(wa(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3))), wceq(co(c0, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), c2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))), wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)))
  eqidd(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), wa(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wi(wa(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))), wceq(co(c0, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), c2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))))
  syl3anc(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))), wceq(co(c0, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), c2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))), wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c2, c7), wcel(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), universe))
  fvexd(c3, cpr(c0, c2), w0)
  ovigg(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c6, c2, c7, cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), universe, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), wa(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  anbi12d(w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))))
  3adant3(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))), wb(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3))))
  eleq1d(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3), cpr(c0, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  eqeq12d(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))))
  simp3(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))))
  3adant3(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))))
  fveq2d(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(c0, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  preq12(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1), c2)
  moani(hs2, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  moeq(hs2, cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  eqid(coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))
  eqtr4d(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), emptycls, wa(w0, wn(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)))))
  imp(w0, wn(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3))), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), emptycls))
  syl6bir(w0, wn(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3))), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), emptycls), wn(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c1))))
  notbid(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c1)), wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)))
  joindef(c0, c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  syl5eq(co(c0, c1, c2), emptycls, cfv(c1, cop(c0, c2)), wn(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c1))))
  df-ov(c0, c1, c2)
  ndmfv(cop(c0, c2), c1)
  adantl(w0, wn(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3))), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), emptycls))
  ndmfv(cpr(c0, c2), c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
}

thm joinval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  ⊣ c3 =(lub ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(join ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c7)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, (c0[c1]c2)=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }), { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3))
  eqtrd((c0[c1]c2), (c3 ` { c0, c2 }), (c0[{ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}]c2), (w0 ∧ { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)))
  adantr(w0, { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3), (c0[c1]c2)=(c0[{ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}]c2))
  oveqd(c0, c1, c2, { < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}, w0)
  syl(w0, c1 = { < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}, c4 ∈ c5)
  joinfval2(hs0, hs1, hs2, c4, c5, c1, c3)
  mp2and((w0 ∧ { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)), (c0[{ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}]c2)=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }), { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3), (c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  simpr(w0, { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3))
  eqidd((c3 ` { c0, c2 }), (w0 ∧ { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)))
  adantr(w0, { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3), (({ c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)∧(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))→(c0[{ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}]c2)=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })))
  syl3anc(w0, (({ c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)∧(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))→(c0[{ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}]c2)=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })), c0 ∈ c6, c2 ∈ c7, (c3 ` { c0, c2 })∈ 𝕌)
  fvexd(c3, { c0, c2 }, w0)
  ovigg(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c6, c2, c7, (c3 ` { c0, c2 }), universe, { < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}, ({ c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)∧(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })), ({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 })))
  anbi12d((hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2 ∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { c0, c2 })), { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3), hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }), { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3), (c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  3adant3(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, hs2 =(c3 ` { c0, c2 }), ({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)↔ { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)))
  eleq1d({ hs0, hs1 }, dom(c3), { c0, c2 }, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2))
  eqeq12d(hs2, (c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }), (c3 ` { c0, c2 }), (c3 ` { c0, c2 }), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2 ∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { c0, c2 })))
  simp3(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, hs2 =(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  3adant3(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, hs2 =(c3 ` { c0, c2 }), (c3 ` { hs0, hs1 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  fveq2d(c3, { hs0, hs1 }, { c0, c2 }, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2))
  preq12(hs0, c0, hs1, c2)
  moani(hs2, { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3), hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))
  moeq(hs2, (c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))
  eqid({ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))})
  eqtr4d((c0[c1]c2), (c3 ` { c0, c2 }), emptycls, (w0 ∧ ¬ { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)))
  imp(w0, ¬ { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3), (c0[c1]c2)= ∅)
  syl6bir(w0, ¬ { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3), (c0[c1]c2)= ∅, ¬ < c0, c2 > ∈ dom(c1))
  notbid(w0, < c0, c2 > ∈ dom(c1), { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3))
  joindef(c0, c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  syl5eq((c0[c1]c2), emptycls, (c1 ` < c0, c2 >), ¬ < c0, c2 > ∈ dom(c1))
  df-ov(c0, c1, c2)
  ndmfv(< c0, c2 >, c1)
  adantl(w0, ¬ { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3), (c3 ` { c0, c2 })= ∅)
  ndmfv({ c0, c2 }, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c((c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  diff.hs0.w(({ c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)∧(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })))
  diff.hs1.w(({ c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)∧(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })))
  diff.hs2.w(({ c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)∧(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })))
  diff.hs2.c((c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))
}

blocks.name: joincl
blocks.content: Closure of join of elements in the domain. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm joincl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cjn, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c1)))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, cfv(cfv(club, c4), cpr(c0, c2)), w0)
  joinval(c0, c1, c2, cfv(club, c4), c4, c5, c3, c3, w0)
  lubcl(cfv(club, c4), cpr(c0, c2), c3, c4, c5, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(cfv(club, c4))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c1)))
  joindef(c0, c2, c1, cfv(club, c4), c4, c5, c3, c3, w0)
  eqid(cfv(club, c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm joincl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)∈ c3)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(join ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → < c0, c2 > ∈ dom(c1))
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[c1]c2), c3, ((lub ` c4)` { c0, c2 }), w0)
  joinval(c0, c1, c2, (lub ` c4), c4, c5, c3, c3, w0)
  lubcl((lub ` c4), { c0, c2 }, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  mpbid(w0, { c0, c2 } ∈ dom((lub ` c4)), < c0, c2 > ∈ dom(c1))
  joindef(c0, c2, c1, (lub ` c4), c4, c5, c3, c3, w0)
  eqid((lub ` c4))
}

blocks.content: Subset property of domain of join. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)

thm joindmss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cjn, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  relssdv(hs0, hs1, cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c1), w0)
  mpbiri(w0, wrel(cdm(c0)), wrel(copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2))))))
  relopab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2))))
  releqd(cdm(c0), copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2)))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2))))), wcel(c2, c3))
  joindm(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c0, cfv(club, c2))
  sylbid(w0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c1)), wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2))))
  joindef(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, cfv(club, c2), c2, c3, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  a1i(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), universe))
  syl6(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c1)), wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  ex(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2))), wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  lubelss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1, c2, cfv(cple, c2), cfv(club, c2), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2)))))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c2))
  eqid(cfv(club, c2))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2))), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(club, c2))))
  sylbir(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  prss(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opelxpi(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c1, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cxp(c1, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

thm joindmss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → dom(c0)⊆(c1 × c1))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ c0 =(join ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
} = {
  relssdv(hs0, hs1, dom(c0), (c1 × c1), w0)
  mpbiri(w0, Rel(dom(c0)), Rel({ < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((lub ` c2))}))
  relopab(hs0, hs1, { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((lub ` c2)))
  releqd(dom(c0), { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((lub ` c2))}, w0)
  syl(w0, dom(c0)= { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((lub ` c2))}, c2 ∈ c3)
  joindm(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c0, (lub ` c2))
  sylbid(w0, < hs0, hs1 > ∈ dom(c0), < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c1 × c1), { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((lub ` c2)))
  joindef(hs0, hs1, c0, (lub ` c2), c2, c3, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  a1i(w0, hs1 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl6(w0, { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((lub ` c2)), < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c1 × c1), { hs0, hs1 } ⊆ c1)
  ex(w0, { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((lub ` c2)), { hs0, hs1 } ⊆ c1)
  lubelss({ hs0, hs1 }, c1, c2, (le ` c2), (lub ` c2), c3, (w0 ∧ { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((lub ` c2))))
  eqid((le ` c2))
  eqid((lub ` c2))
  adantr(w0, { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((lub ` c2)), c2 ∈ c3)
  simpr(w0, { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((lub ` c2)))
  sylbir({ hs0, hs1 } ⊆ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c1 × c1), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1))
  prss(hs0, c1, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opelxpi(hs0, c1, hs1, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs0.c((c1 × c1))
  diff.hs1.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs1.c((c1 × c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}
