thm joinval2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), crio(s0, c3, wa(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s1)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cple, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cjn, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c0, c1, c2), crio(s0, c3, wa(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s1)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))), cfv(cfv(club, c5), cpr(c0, c2)), crio(s0, c3, wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))), w0)
  joinval(c0, c1, c2, cfv(club, c5), c5, c6, c3, c3, w0)
  lubval(s0, hs0, s1, cfv(club, c5), cpr(c0, c2), c3, c5, c4, c6, w0, wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))
  eqid(cfv(club, c5))
  biid(wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))
  prssd(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c3, wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))), crio(s0, c3, wa(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s1)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))), wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  riotabidv(s0, c3, wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))), wa(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s0)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s1)), wbr(c2, c4, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))
  joinval2lem(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c1, c6, w0)

  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → < c2, c0 > ∈ dom(c3))
} = {
  simplrd(w0, c0[c1](c2[c3]c0), c2[c1](c2[c3]c0), ∀(hs0 ∈ c4,((c2[c1]hs0 ∧ c0[c1]hs0)→(c2[c3]c0)[c1]hs0)))
  joinlem(hs0, c2, c1, c3, c0, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}

blocks.name: joinle
blocks.content: A join is less than or equal to a third value iff each argument is less than or equal to the third value. (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm joinle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2)), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cple, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cjn, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cpo))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c3), cdm(c4)))
} = {
  impbid(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2)), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2))
  rspcdva(hs0, c2, c5, w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2)), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c3, c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, cv(hs0))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c3, c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, cv(hs0)), wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2)), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c3, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0, c1)
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, c3, c1)
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, co(c0, c4, c3), c1)
  simprd(w0, wral(hs0, c5, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c3, c1, cv(hs0))), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, cv(hs0)))), wa(wbr(c0, c1, co(c0, c4, c3)), wbr(c3, c1, co(c0, c4, c3))))
  joinlem(hs0, c0, c1, c4, c3, c5, c6, cpo, w0)
  jcad(w0, wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2))
  mpand(w0, wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c1, co(c0, c4, c3)))
  lejoin1(c0, c1, c4, c3, c5, c6, cpo, w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, co(c0, c4, c3)), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2)), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c6, cpo), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(co(c0, c4, c3), c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  postr(c6, c0, c5, co(c0, c4, c3), c2, c1)
  mpand(w0, wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, co(c0, c4, c3)))
  lejoin2(c3, c1, c0, c4, c5, c6, cpo, w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c3, c1, co(c0, c4, c3)), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2)), wbr(c3, c1, c2)), wcel(c6, cpo), wcel(c3, c5), wcel(co(c0, c4, c3), c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  joincl(c0, c4, c3, c5, c6, cpo, w0)
  postr(c6, c3, c5, co(c0, c4, c3), c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c2)), wbr(co(c0, c4, c3), c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm joinle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[c1]c2 ∧ c3[c1]c2)↔(c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ⊣ c1 =(le ` c6)
  ⊣ c4 =(join ` c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ Poset)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → < c0, c3 > ∈ dom(c4))
} = {
  impbid(w0, (c0[c1]c2 ∧ c3[c1]c2), (c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2)
  rspcdva(hs0, c2, c5, w0, ((c0[c1]c2 ∧ c3[c1]c2)→(c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2), ((c0[c1]hs0 ∧ c3[c1]hs0)→(c0[c4]c3)[c1]hs0))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c2, (c0[c1]hs0 ∧ c3[c1]hs0), (c0[c4]c3)[c1]hs0, (c0[c1]c2 ∧ c3[c1]c2), (c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2)
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, c0[c1]hs0, c3[c1]hs0, c0[c1]c2, c3[c1]c2)
  breq2(hs0, c2, c0, c1)
  breq2(hs0, c2, c3, c1)
  breq2(hs0, c2, (c0[c4]c3), c1)
  simprd(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c5,((c0[c1]hs0 ∧ c3[c1]hs0)→(c0[c4]c3)[c1]hs0)), (c0[c1](c0[c4]c3)∧ c3[c1](c0[c4]c3)))
  joinlem(hs0, c0, c1, c4, c3, c5, c6, cpo, w0)
  jcad(w0, (c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2, c0[c1]c2, c3[c1]c2)
  mpand(w0, (c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2, c0[c1]c2, c0[c1](c0[c4]c3))
  lejoin1(c0, c1, c4, c3, c5, c6, cpo, w0)
  syl13anc(w0, ((c0[c1](c0[c4]c3)∧(c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2)→ c0[c1]c2), c6 ∈ Poset, c0 ∈ c5, (c0[c4]c3)∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5)
  postr(c6, c0, c5, (c0[c4]c3), c2, c1)
  mpand(w0, (c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2, c3[c1]c2, c3[c1](c0[c4]c3))
  lejoin2(c3, c1, c0, c4, c5, c6, cpo, w0)
  syl13anc(w0, ((c3[c1](c0[c4]c3)∧(c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2)→ c3[c1]c2), c6 ∈ Poset, c3 ∈ c5, (c0[c4]c3)∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5)
  joincl(c0, c4, c3, c5, c6, cpo, w0)
  postr(c6, c3, c5, (c0[c4]c3), c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0[c1]c2 ∧ c3[c1]c2)→(c0[c4]c3)[c1]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
}

blocks.name: meetfval
blocks.content: Value of meet function for a poset. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2011.) (Revised by NM, 9-Sep-2018.) TODO: prove ~ meetfval2 first to reduce net proof size (existence part)?

thm meetfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cglb, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmee, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(c2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))), cfv(cmee, c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cfv(cmee, c0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)))), wcel(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))), universe))
  ssexd(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), universe, wcel(c0, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), universe))
  oprabex(s0, s1, s2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wmo(s2, wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  moeq(s2, cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  eqid(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, universe), wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))))
  alrimiv(s0, wcel(c0, universe), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
  alrimiv(s1, wcel(c0, universe), wal(s2, wi(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))
  alrimiv(s2, wcel(c0, universe), wi(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2))))
  ax-mp(wb(wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2)))), wfun(c3))
  glbfun(c3, c0)
  funbrfv2b(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))
  anim12d1(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  syl6ibr(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  ex(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  glbelss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cbs, c0), c0, cfv(cple, c0), c3, universe, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
  simpl(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)))
  prss(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0), cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  biimpi(wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  eqcom(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2))
  ssoprab2(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, universe, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))), universe, cmee, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), cv(s2))))
  oprabbidv(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)))
  breqd(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), cv(s2), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cglb, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cglb)
  df-meet(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cbs, c0)
  diff.cbs.s(s2)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.cpr.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wbr(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

thm meetfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 = { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | { s0, s1 }[c3]s2 })
  ⊣ c3 =(glb ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(meet ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
} = {
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, c2 = { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | { s0, s1 }[c3]s2 }, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(c2, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | { s0, s1 }[c3]s2 }, (meet ` c0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  mpdan(c0 ∈ 𝕌, (meet ` c0)= { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | { s0, s1 }[c3]s2 }, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | { s0, s1 }[c3]s2 } ∈ 𝕌)
  ssexd({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | { s0, s1 }[c3]s2 }, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ s1 ∈(Base ` c0))∧ s2 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 }))}, universe, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  a1i(c0 ∈ 𝕌, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ s1 ∈(Base ` c0))∧ s2 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 }))} ∈ 𝕌)
  oprabex(s0, s1, s2, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ s1 ∈(Base ` c0))∧ s2 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 }))}, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c0), s2 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 }))
  fvex(cbs, c0)
  a1i((s0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ s1 ∈(Base ` c0)), ∃*(s2, s2 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 })))
  moeq(s2, (c3 ` { s0, s1 }))
  eqid({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ s1 ∈(Base ` c0))∧ s2 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 }))})
  syl(c0 ∈ 𝕌, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | { s0, s1 }[c3]s2 } ⊆ { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ s1 ∈(Base ` c0))∧ s2 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 }))}, ∀(s0, ∀(s1, ∀(s2,({ s0, s1 }[c3]s2 →((s0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ s1 ∈(Base ` c0))∧ s2 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 })))))))
  alrimiv(s0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∀(s1, ∀(s2,({ s0, s1 }[c3]s2 →((s0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ s1 ∈(Base ` c0))∧ s2 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 }))))))
  alrimiv(s1, c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∀(s2,({ s0, s1 }[c3]s2 →((s0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ s1 ∈(Base ` c0))∧ s2 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 })))))
  alrimiv(s2, c0 ∈ 𝕌, ({ s0, s1 }[c3]s2 →((s0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ s1 ∈(Base ` c0))∧ s2 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 }))))

thm meetfval2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

thm meetdm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c2), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cglb, c0))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  syl6eq(cdm(c2), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3))), cdm(coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  dmeqd(c2, coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  meetfval2(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  eqtri(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), copab(s0, s1, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3))), copab(s0, s1, wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))))
  dmoprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  opabbii(s0, s1, wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)))
  mpbiran2(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  isseti(hs0, cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  fvex(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  19.42v(hs0, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c3, cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c3)))
}

thm meetdm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → dom(c2)= { < s0, s1 > | { s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3)})
  ⊣ c3 =(glb ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(meet ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  syl6eq(dom(c2), { < s0, s1 > | { s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3)}, dom({ < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |({ s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs0 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 }))}), c0 ∈ c1)
  dmeqd(c2, { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |({ s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs0 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 }))}, c0 ∈ c1)
  meetfval2(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  eqtri(dom({ < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |({ s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs0 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 }))}), { < s0, s1 > | { s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3)}, { < s0, s1 > | ∃(hs0,({ s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs0 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 })))})
  dmoprab(s0, s1, hs0, ({ s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs0 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 })))
  opabbii(s0, s1, ∃(hs0,({ s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs0 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 }))), { s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3))
  mpbiran2(∃(hs0,({ s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs0 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 }))), { s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3), ∃(hs0, hs0 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 })))
  isseti(hs0, (c3 ` { s0, s1 }))
  fvex(c3, { s0, s1 })
  19.42v(hs0, { s0, s1 } ∈ dom(c3), hs0 =(c3 ` { s0, s1 }))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)

}

thm meetdef(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cdm(c3))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cglb, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmee, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cdm(c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)))))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3))))), wcel(c4, c5))
  eleq2d(cop(c0, c1), cdm(c2), copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3))), wcel(c4, c5))
  meetdm(hs0, hs1, c4, c5, c2, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)))), wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cdm(c3))), wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c1, c7))
  opelopabg(hs0, hs1, c0, c6, c1, c7, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cdm(c3)), wcel(cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)))
  eleq1d(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3), cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  preq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  eleq1d(cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), cdm(c3), cpr(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  preq2(cv(hs1), c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cdm(c3)))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cdm(c3)))
}

thm meetdef(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(< c0, c1 > ∈ dom(c2)↔ { c0, c1 } ∈ dom(c3)))
  ⊣ c3 =(glb ` c4)

  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)

} = {

  syl(w0, (< c0, c1 > ∈ dom(c2)↔ < c0, c1 > ∈ { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)}), c4 ∈ c5)
  eleq2d(< c0, c1 >, dom(c2), { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)}, c4 ∈ c5)
  meetdm(hs0, hs1, c4, c5, c2, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, (< c0, c1 > ∈ { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)} ↔ { c0, c1 } ∈ dom(c3)), c0 ∈ c6, c1 ∈ c7)
  opelopabg(hs0, hs1, c0, c6, c1, c7, { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3), { c0, c1 } ∈ dom(c3), { c0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3))
  eleq1d({ hs0, hs1 }, dom(c3), { c0, hs1 }, hs0 = c0)
  preq1(hs0, c0, hs1)
  eleq1d({ c0, hs1 }, dom(c3), { c0, c1 }, hs1 = c1)
  preq2(hs1, c1, c0)

  syl(w0, wceq(c1, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))), wcel(c4, c5))

  syl3anc(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))), wceq(co(c0, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), c2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))), wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c2, c7), wcel(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), universe))
  fvexd(c3, cpr(c0, c2), w0)
  ovigg(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c6, c2, c7, cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), universe, coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), wa(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))), wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  anbi12d(w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)), wceq(cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))))
  3adant3(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))), wb(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3))))
  eleq1d(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3), cpr(c0, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  eqeq12d(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)))))
  simp3(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2))))

  fveq2d(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(c0, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))

  moani(hs2, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  moeq(hs2, cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  eqid(coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(c3, cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))
  eqtr4d(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), emptycls, wa(w0, wn(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3)))))
  imp(w0, wn(wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(c3))), wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), emptycls))

thm meetval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  ⊣ c3 =(glb ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(meet ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c7)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, (c0[c1]c2)=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }), { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3))
  eqtrd((c0[c1]c2), (c3 ` { c0, c2 }), (c0[{ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}]c2), (w0 ∧ { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)))
  adantr(w0, { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3), (c0[c1]c2)=(c0[{ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}]c2))
  oveqd(c0, c1, c2, { < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}, w0)
  syl(w0, c1 = { < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}, c4 ∈ c5)
  meetfval2(hs0, hs1, hs2, c4, c5, c1, c3)
  mp2and((w0 ∧ { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)), (c0[{ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}]c2)=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }), { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3), (c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  simpr(w0, { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3))
  eqidd((c3 ` { c0, c2 }), (w0 ∧ { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)))
  adantr(w0, { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3), (({ c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)∧(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))→(c0[{ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}]c2)=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })))
  syl3anc(w0, (({ c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)∧(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))→(c0[{ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}]c2)=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })), c0 ∈ c6, c2 ∈ c7, (c3 ` { c0, c2 })∈ 𝕌)
  fvexd(c3, { c0, c2 }, w0)
  ovigg(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c6, c2, c7, (c3 ` { c0, c2 }), universe, { < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))}, ({ c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)∧(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })), ({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 })))
  anbi12d((hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2 ∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { c0, c2 })), { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3), hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }), { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3), (c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  3adant3(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, hs2 =(c3 ` { c0, c2 }), ({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)↔ { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)))
  eleq1d({ hs0, hs1 }, dom(c3), { c0, c2 }, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2))
  eqeq12d(hs2, (c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }), (c3 ` { c0, c2 }), (c3 ` { c0, c2 }), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2 ∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { c0, c2 })))
  simp3(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, hs2 =(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  3adant3(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, hs2 =(c3 ` { c0, c2 }), (c3 ` { hs0, hs1 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  fveq2d(c3, { hs0, hs1 }, { c0, c2 }, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2))
  preq12(hs0, c0, hs1, c2)
  moani(hs2, { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3), hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))
  moeq(hs2, (c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))
  eqid({ < < hs0, hs1 >, hs2 > |({ hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom(c3)∧ hs2 =(c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))})
  eqtr4d((c0[c1]c2), (c3 ` { c0, c2 }), emptycls, (w0 ∧ ¬ { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)))
  imp(w0, ¬ { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3), (c0[c1]c2)= ∅)
  syl6bir(w0, ¬ { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3), (c0[c1]c2)= ∅, ¬ < c0, c2 > ∈ dom(c1))
  notbid(w0, < c0, c2 > ∈ dom(c1), { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3))
  meetdef(c0, c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  syl5eq((c0[c1]c2), emptycls, (c1 ` < c0, c2 >), ¬ < c0, c2 > ∈ dom(c1))
  df-ov(c0, c1, c2)
  ndmfv(< c0, c2 >, c1)
  adantl(w0, ¬ { c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3), (c3 ` { c0, c2 })= ∅)
  ndmfv({ c0, c2 }, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c((c3 ` { c0, c2 }))
  diff.hs0.w(({ c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)∧(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })))
  diff.hs1.w(({ c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)∧(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })))
  diff.hs2.w(({ c0, c2 } ∈ dom(c3)∧(c3 ` { c0, c2 })=(c3 ` { c0, c2 })))
  diff.hs2.c((c3 ` { hs0, hs1 }))
}

blocks.name: meetcl
blocks.content: Closure of meet of elements in the domain. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm meetcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmee, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c1)))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, cfv(cfv(cglb, c4), cpr(c0, c2)), w0)
  meetval(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cglb, c4), c4, c5, c3, c3, w0)
  glbcl(cfv(cglb, c4), cpr(c0, c2), c3, c4, c5, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c2), cdm(cfv(cglb, c4))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c1)))
  meetdef(c0, c2, c1, cfv(cglb, c4), c4, c5, c3, c3, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cglb, c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm meetcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)∈ c3)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(meet ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → < c0, c2 > ∈ dom(c1))
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[c1]c2), c3, ((glb ` c4)` { c0, c2 }), w0)
  meetval(c0, c1, c2, (glb ` c4), c4, c5, c3, c3, w0)
  glbcl((glb ` c4), { c0, c2 }, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  mpbid(w0, { c0, c2 } ∈ dom((glb ` c4)), < c0, c2 > ∈ dom(c1))
  meetdef(c0, c2, c1, (glb ` c4), c4, c5, c3, c3, w0)
  eqid((glb ` c4))
}

thm meetdmss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmee, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  relssdv(hs0, hs1, cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c1), w0)
  mpbiri(w0, wrel(cdm(c0)), wrel(copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2))))))
  relopab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2))))
  releqd(cdm(c0), copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2)))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2))))), wcel(c2, c3))
  meetdm(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c0, cfv(cglb, c2))
  sylbid(w0, wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c1)), wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2))))
  meetdef(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, cfv(cglb, c2), c2, c3, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  a1i(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), universe))
  syl6(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c1)), wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  ex(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2))), wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  glbelss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1, c2, cfv(cple, c2), cfv(cglb, c2), c3, wa(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2)))))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cglb, c2))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2))), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cfv(cglb, c2))))
  sylbir(wss(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  prss(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opelxpi(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c1, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cxp(c1, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm meetdmss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → dom(c0)⊆(c1 × c1))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ c0 =(meet ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
} = {
  relssdv(hs0, hs1, dom(c0), (c1 × c1), w0)
  mpbiri(w0, Rel(dom(c0)), Rel({ < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((glb ` c2))}))
  relopab(hs0, hs1, { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((glb ` c2)))
  releqd(dom(c0), { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((glb ` c2))}, w0)
  syl(w0, dom(c0)= { < hs0, hs1 > | { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((glb ` c2))}, c2 ∈ c3)
  meetdm(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c0, (glb ` c2))
  sylbid(w0, < hs0, hs1 > ∈ dom(c0), < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c1 × c1), { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((glb ` c2)))
  meetdef(hs0, hs1, c0, (glb ` c2), c2, c3, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  a1i(w0, hs1 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl6(w0, { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((glb ` c2)), < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c1 × c1), { hs0, hs1 } ⊆ c1)
  ex(w0, { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((glb ` c2)), { hs0, hs1 } ⊆ c1)
  glbelss({ hs0, hs1 }, c1, c2, (le ` c2), (glb ` c2), c3, (w0 ∧ { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((glb ` c2))))
  eqid((le ` c2))
  eqid((glb ` c2))
  adantr(w0, { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((glb ` c2)), c2 ∈ c3)
  simpr(w0, { hs0, hs1 } ∈ dom((glb ` c2)))
  sylbir({ hs0, hs1 } ⊆ c1, < hs0, hs1 > ∈(c1 × c1), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1))
  prss(hs0, c1, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  opelxpi(hs0, c1, hs1, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs0.c((c1 × c1))
  diff.hs1.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs1.c((c1 × c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

thm meetval2lem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wa(wral(s0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0))), wral(s2, c1, wi(wral(s0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1))))), wa(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s1), c3, c2)), wral(s2, c1, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s2), c3, c0), wbr(cv(s2), c3, c2)), wbr(cv(s2), c3, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmee, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
} = {

blocks.name: meetval2
blocks.content: Value of meet for a poset with LUB expanded. (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2011.) (Revised by NM, 11-Sep-2018.)

thm meetval2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), crio(s0, c3, wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c2)), wral(s1, c3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s1), c4, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cple, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmee, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c0, c1, c2), crio(s0, c3, wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c2)), wral(s1, c3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s1), c4, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), cfv(cfv(cglb, c5), cpr(c0, c2)), crio(s0, c3, wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), w0)
  meetval(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cglb, c5), c5, c6, c3, c3, w0)
  glbval(s0, hs0, s1, cfv(cglb, c5), cpr(c0, c2), c3, c5, c4, c6, w0, wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))))
  eqid(cfv(cglb, c5))
  biid(wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))))
  prssd(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c3, wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)))))), crio(s0, c3, wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c2)), wral(s1, c3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s1), c4, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))))), wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  riotabidv(s0, c3, wa(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0))), wral(s1, c3, wi(wral(hs0, cpr(c0, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))), wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c2)), wral(s1, c3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s1), c4, c2)), wbr(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))))
  meetval2lem(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c1, c6, w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cpr(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.cpr.s(s1, c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm meetval2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)= iota(s0 ∈ c3,((s0[c4]c0 ∧ s0[c4]c2)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c3,((s1[c4]c0 ∧ s1[c4]c2)→ s1[c4]s0)))))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c4 =(le ` c5)
  ⊣ c1 =(meet ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  3eqtrd((c0[c1]c2), iota(s0 ∈ c3,((s0[c4]c0 ∧ s0[c4]c2)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c3,((s1[c4]c0 ∧ s1[c4]c2)→ s1[c4]s0)))), ((glb ` c5)` { c0, c2 }), iota(s0 ∈ c3,(∀(hs0 ∈ { c0, c2 }, s0[c4]hs0)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(∀(hs0 ∈ { c0, c2 }, s1[c4]hs0)→ s1[c4]s0)))), w0)
  meetval(c0, c1, c2, (glb ` c5), c5, c6, c3, c3, w0)
  glbval(s0, hs0, s1, (glb ` c5), { c0, c2 }, c3, c5, c4, c6, w0, (∀(hs0 ∈ { c0, c2 }, s0[c4]hs0)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(∀(hs0 ∈ { c0, c2 }, s1[c4]hs0)→ s1[c4]s0))))
  eqid((glb ` c5))
  biid((∀(hs0 ∈ { c0, c2 }, s0[c4]hs0)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(∀(hs0 ∈ { c0, c2 }, s1[c4]hs0)→ s1[c4]s0))))
  prssd(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, iota(s0 ∈ c3,(∀(hs0 ∈ { c0, c2 }, s0[c4]hs0)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(∀(hs0 ∈ { c0, c2 }, s1[c4]hs0)→ s1[c4]s0))))= iota(s0 ∈ c3,((s0[c4]c0 ∧ s0[c4]c2)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c3,((s1[c4]c0 ∧ s1[c4]c2)→ s1[c4]s0)))), c0 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ c3)
  riotabidv(s0, c3, (c0 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (∀(hs0 ∈ { c0, c2 }, s0[c4]hs0)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(∀(hs0 ∈ { c0, c2 }, s1[c4]hs0)→ s1[c4]s0))), ((s0[c4]c0 ∧ s0[c4]c2)∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c3,((s1[c4]c0 ∧ s1[c4]c2)→ s1[c4]s0))))
  meetval2lem(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c1, c6, w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c({ c0, c2 })
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.cpr.s(s1, c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

blocks.name: meeteu
blocks.content: Uniqueness of meet of elements in the domain. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm meeteu(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wreu(s0, c0, wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c3)), wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cple, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmee, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cop(c2, c3), cdm(c5)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wreu(s0, c0, wa(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, c2), wbr(cv(s0), c1, c3)), wral(s1, c0, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s1), c1, c2), wbr(cv(s1), c1, c3)), wbr(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))))), wcel(cop(c2, c3), cdm(c5)))

thm meetle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, co(c2, c4, c3))))

} = {
  impbid(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, co(c2, c4, c3)))

thm meetle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[c1]c2 ∧ c0[c1]c3)↔ c0[c1](c2[c4]c3)))
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c6)

  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → < c2, c3 > ∈ dom(c4))

  fveq2i(cfv(club, c0), cpr(c4, c2), cpr(c2, c4))

  ⊣ d(s3, s4)

blocks.name: p0val
blocks.content: Value of poset zero. (Contributed by NM, 12-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm p0val(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(c3, c4)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cglb, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cp0, c0))
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(c3, c4)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(c2, cfv(c3, c4), cfv(cp0, c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cp0, cfv(c3, c4), cfv(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
  fveq12d(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cglb, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cglb)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  df-p0(hs0)
  fvex(c3, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c3, c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm p0val(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 =(c3 ` c4))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(glb ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(0. ` c0)
} = {
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, c2 =(c3 ` c4), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(c2, (c3 ` c4), (0. ` c0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cp0, (c3 ` c4), ((glb ` hs0)`(Base ` hs0)))
  fveq12d((glb ` hs0), (Base ` hs0), c3, c4, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((glb ` hs0), c3, (glb ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cglb)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c4, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  df-p0(hs0)
  fvex(c3, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((c3 ` c4))
}

blocks.name: p0le
blocks.content: Any element is less than or equal to a poset's upper bound (if defined). (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2011.) (Revised by NM, 13-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm p0le(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cglb, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cple, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cp0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cdm(c5)))
} = {
  eqbrtrd(c0, c1, c2, cfv(c5, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(c5, c3)), wcel(c4, c6))
  p0val(c4, c6, c0, c5, c3)
  glble(c5, c3, c1, c2, c3, c4, c6, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm p0le(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[c1]c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(glb ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(le ` c4)
  ⊣ c0 =(0. ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ dom(c5))
} = {
  eqbrtrd(c0, c1, c2, (c5 ` c3), w0)
  syl(w0, c0 =(c5 ` c3), c4 ∈ c6)
  p0val(c4, c6, c0, c5, c3)
  glble(c5, c3, c1, c2, c3, c4, c6, w0)
}
